Title: School Hours Discord Rules
Description:
This community is meant to be a chill place for people to connect and discuss all things school or gaming related. While this isn’t a strict server, it’s meant to be a safe space. If your intents are contrary to this vision, please find some other outlet. We take the rules very seriously and temporary and/or permanent bans for first offenses will not be unusual. Please don’t break the rules.
The rules below are guidelines only and are not all inclusive. Please use common sense, stay safe, and have fun!

Fields.name: Rule 1 - Keep channel discussions on topic
Fields.value: Keep the conversations relevant to the channel they belong in. If you don’t know where to take off-topic conversations, go to #general

Fields.name: Rule 2 - No harassment, discrimination or abuse of any kind
Fields.value: Be respectful. This excludes but is not limited to racism, hate speech, hazing, or any other forms of harassment
